sections.text:
Correction to: An investigation into the reliability of a mobile app designed to assess orthodontic treatment need and severity The original article can be found online at https://doi.org/10.1038/s41415-022-4246-2
Journal’s correction note: Research article Br Dent J 2022; 232: 721–726.
When this article was originally published, incorrect versions of Figure 1 and Figure 2 were displayed. The correct figures are presented here, in which the individual graph labels have been corrected.
BRITISH DENTAL JOURNAL | VOLUME 232 NO. 12 | JUNE 24 2022 895

The journal apologises for any inconvenience caused.
896 BRITISH DENTAL JOURNAL | VOLUME 232 NO. 12 | JUNE 24 2022
© 2021 The Author(s), under exclusive licence to British Dental Association

title: Correction to: An investigation into the reliability of a mobile app designed to assess orthodontic treatment need and severity
